item.title: Atmospheric Rivers Have Intensified Over The Past 45 Years
item.description: Atmospheric rivers have become wetter, strong, and more frequent, and could have catastrophic impacts in the coming decades.

item.title: Ryan Breslow Settles Lawsuits After Returning As Bolt CEO: ‘I Made A Ton Of Mistakes’
item.description: Bolt cofounder Ryan Breslow has returned as CEO of the payment startup after settling lawsuits with some of his biggest investors.

item.title: Avocados Were Domesticated 7,500 Years Ago According To Fossil Evidence

item.title: Cigna Shakes Up Management Ranks Amid Rising Costs
item.description: The Cigna Group shook up its management team amid rising healthcare costs and pressure from employer clients to hold the line on spending.
